member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.PullToRefresh.SfPullToRefresh
member.summary: Represents a panel that a refreshing content and Refreshes the main content of the application.
member.remarks: PullToRefresh is a panel which can swiped down on the appliation to refresh the contents of the page It is hidden most of the time, but is revealed when the user swipes a finger down on the screen
